ygData.subject: RE: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: As people began to believe one thing nad become so advant abouit it, they tend to become ugly to the point of hatred. People speak so freely about what they
ygData.messageBody:
As people began to believe one thing nad become so advant abouit it, they
tend to become ugly to the point of hatred. People speak so freely about
what they know is right or wrong without even really finding out a deffinent
asnwer for themselves. As for the person that is angry about this thread,
man lighten up. As for right now everyone knows that Tinkering like Reaserch
is a trade skill. That means that when you learn it you can continue to
learn with out me capped out on a level. I have read many threads where
people believe this or that. Then when someone says something and everyone
finds out it was true they are like I knew that. Ok As far as it has been
said my BM is that on all trade skills includeing research and the other
hard to raise skills there is no cap per level. So I believe that it is
possible to go above actually I have a gnome with 77 and I am 18 that is 2
points above max. I got the money to raise this from my guild but none the
less. FRom my experiance and what has been said it seems the either one the
cap is different or the cap is gone. I do not doubt anything people have
said but it seems that, there may be alot of truth in some things.
